title: Washer/Dryer in Unit, Package Lockers, Controlled Access/Gated
posting_body: ['WE ARE OFFERING TOURS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY!', 'CALL', 'show contact info', 'x 7', 'OR Text', '7', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'NOW!', 'Motif Apartment Homes', '21021 Erwin Street, Woodland Hills, CA, 91367', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 7', 'OR Text', '7', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Use this link for more info:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to Motif!', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1484 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'With its bold, modernist design and vibrant color scheme, Motif is far from ordinary.', 'Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes combine resort-style amenities with luxurious and spacious floor plans in the heart of Warner Center.', 'With its unique features such as high ceilings and upgraded chef’s kitchen, Motif is a cut above the rest.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed.', 'Pet rent and additional deposit for pet.', '*Breed restrictions apply.', 'Driving Directions:', 'On the corner of Erwin and De Soto', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Sunday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'qGN0tx3qXdU']
